response.original_title: CCP’s Tanghalan Naming Tahanan: The CCP@52 Anniversary Showcase
response.overview: As today they have taken to the screens to bring the stage to wider and wider audiences, art continues whether or not converged in our performance spaces. The CCP Anniversary Feature brings together the resident companies of the CCP through a selection of their various online performances, put together into a video production.
response.title: CCP’s Tanghalan Naming Tahanan: The CCP@52 Anniversary Showcase
